Package PContour

Class PContour.Contour

java.lang.Object
PContour.PContour.Contour
Enclosing class:
PContour
public class PContour.Contour
extends java.lang.Object
Data structure for a contour, encodes vertices as well as hierarchical relationship to other contours

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    int id
    Unique ID, starts from 2
    boolean isHole
    Is this contour a hole (as opposed to outline)
    int parent
    ID of parent contour, 0 means top-level contour
    java.util.ArrayList<PContour.Point> points
    Vertices
